meta.title: Babu Media - Build Your Own Disney World
meta.description: Transform passive screen time into active bonding with personalized bedtime stories

hero.subtitle: Transform Passive Screen Time into Active Bonding
hero.description: Create AI-powered characters with your child, then watch them come to life in personalized bedtime adventures. No coding. No drawing skills. Just imagination.

pillars.title: The 5 Pillars of Imagination
pillars.subtitle: Babu Media isn't just a story app. It's a complete digital ecosystem designed to spark creativity and build confidence.

fusionLab.title: The Fusion Lab
fusionLab.description: Don't just choose a character. Build one. Pick an animal, dress it up, give it a personality. AI brings your creation to life in seconds.

plotWorld.title: The Plot World
plotWorld.description: Bedtime reimagined. YOUR character. YOUR adventure. Type any idea—"rescue a cloud stuck in a tree"—and watch AI spin a 5-page illustrated story in minutes.

classroom.title: The Classroom
classroom.description: Learning is easier when it's fun. Math with your fox. Reading with your unicorn. Personalized educational games that make your child the teacher's pet.

playground.title: The Playground
playground.description: Play casual games starring YOUR character. Jumping puzzles. Matching games. Every win feels personal because that's YOUR creation on screen.

commRooms.title: Comm Rooms
commRooms.description: Build confidence through conversation. Your child's character becomes a safe space for practicing social scenarios, expressing feelings, and building emotional intelligence.

step1.title: Create Character
step1.description: Pick animal, style, outfit. AI brings it to life.

step2.title: Choose Adventure
step2.description: Any idea becomes a 5-page illustrated story.

step3.title: Read Together
step3.description: Swipe through pages. Watch the animated climax.

testimonial1.quote: For the first time, bedtime isn't a battle. My daughter asks to create stories with me. The bonding is real—we're building something together.
testimonial1.author: Sarah M.

testimonial2.quote: The 'Ikea Effect' is real. My son is obsessed with HIS fox character. He cares about these stories because he helped create them.
testimonial2.author: David R.

testimonial3.quote: Finally, an app that makes ME the hero sidekick. We create together, read together, laugh together. Screen time I actually feel good about.
testimonial3.author: Michael K.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you're ready.
